title: What You Must Know BEFORE Getting Backyard Chickens (Egg-Laying Hens)
itunes:title: What You Must Know BEFORE Getting Backyard Chickens (Egg-Laying Hens)
description: Keeping backyard egg-laying chickens is a wonderful way to offset your food costs. It’s also great to know you’re getting healthy eggs from hens that have been fed non-GMO food and had plenty of access to fresh greens, bugs and worms. But there are some specifics you’ll want to know before bringing your chickens home for the best success. Check out today’s podcast for everything you need to know to raise backyard chickens. For more information and shownotes visit melissaknorris.com/297.
